Challenges for Cyclicity
Gereon Mueller
March 2024
 

This paper lays out and discusses classical concepts of cyclicity from the point of view of modern grammatical theory (in particular, the minimalist program), focussing on the Cyclic Principle and the Strict Cycle Condition in syntax and morphology. Against this background, the paper addresses two challenges for cyclicity.
